text.name: Enough is Enough
text.desc:
On Hit with this Skill: heal 30% of the HP damage dealt (max 10)
[WhenUse] Consume up to 50 [BloodDinner] and gain 1 [BloodArmorPersonalityFirst] for every 5 [BloodDinner] this unit consumed
- If this unit failed to consume [BloodDinner], gain 5 [Laceration]

text.name: Laughters Shall Subside
text.desc:
[DuelCounter]
[StartBattle] Consume up to 50 [BloodDinner] and gain 1 [BloodArmorPersonalityFirst] for every 10 [BloodDinner]
- If this unit failed to consume [BloodDinner], gain 10 [Laceration]
[StartBattle] To 1 ally with the least HP: apply 1 [SwirlingBloodPersonality] for every 50 [BloodDinner_Common_Accumulation] (max 10, once per turn)

text.name: Laughters Shall Subside
text.desc:
[DuelCounter]
[StartBattle] Consume up to 50 [BloodDinner] and gain 1 [BloodArmorPersonalityFirst] for every 10 [BloodDinner]
- If this unit failed to consume [BloodDinner], gain 10 [Laceration]
[StartBattle] To 1 ally with the least HP: apply 1 [SwirlingBloodPersonality] for every 50 [BloodDinner_Common_Accumulation] (max 15, once per turn)

text.name: Variant Sancho Hardblood Arts 15 - Buildup to Finale
text.desc:
[DuelCounter]
[StartBattle] To (3 + (highest Reson. / 2)) allies with the least HP: apply (1 + ([BloodArmorPersonalityFirst] / 15)) [SwirlingBloodPersonality] for every 40 [BloodDinner_Common_Accumulation], then consume half of [BloodArmorPersonalityFirst] on self. (once per ally; rounded down)

text.name: Variant Sancho Hardblood Arts 15 - Buildup to Finale
text.desc:
[DuelCounter]
[StartBattle] To (3 + (highest Reson. / 2)) allies with the least HP: apply (1 + ([BloodArmorPersonalityFirst] / 10)) [SwirlingBloodPersonality] for every 40 [BloodDinner_Common_Accumulation], then consume half of [BloodArmorPersonalityFirst] on self. (once per ally; rounded down)

1031021.name: ‘Feed your repressed hunger, my Family’
1031021.desc:
Combat Start: 1 ally with the least HP gains 1 [AttackDmgUp] for every 20% missing HP (max 3)
- If the said ally is a <Bloodfiend>, gain 1 [AttackDmgUp] for every 15% missing HP instead (max 3)

1031001.name: Bloodfeast
1031001.desc:
If this unit is on field, or is one of the units that can appear on this Stage, increase [BloodDinner] value by the amount of [Laceration] damage collectively received by every unit.
When this unit enters the field, the sleeping blood drenching the battlefield will fill the surface.

When consuming [BloodDinner], if there are <La Manchaland[TabExplain]> Kindreds of the same generation as this unit, this unit takes precedence.

When using 'Variant Sancho Hardblood[TabExplain] Arts 6 - Whip', HP cannot drop below 1 due to [Laceration] damage.

1031002.name: Variant Sancho Hardblood Arts
1031002.desc:
Turn Start: At 15+ [BloodArmorPersonalityFirst], if each following unit is either defeated or participating in the Encounter, empower this unit's leftmost Slot.
The Priest of La Manchaland[TabExplain] Gregor: Empower Skill 1
The Barber of La Manchaland[TabExplain] Outis: Empower Skill 2
This Unit: Empower Skill 3
The Princess of La Manchaland[TabExplain] Rodion: Empower Defense Skill[TabExplain]

When other units among allies take [Laceration] damage or consume [BloodDinner], gain 2 [BloodArmorPersonalityFirst] on self (3 times per turn)

1031003.name: Bearer of the Blood Kin
1031003.desc:
In an Encounter, if an other allied <La Manchaland[TabExplain]> unit is defeated:
- Gain 1 more [BloodArmorPersonalityFirst] when gaining [BloodArmorPersonalityFirst] from this unit's Base Attack Skills
- When 3+ other allied <La Manchaland[TabExplain]> units are defeated: gain 3 additional [BloodArmorPersonalityFirst]; at Turn Start, gain 1 [SadLamanchaland]

1031004.name: Armadura de Sangre
1031004.desc:
After Attack: if the enemy is defeated, increase [BloodDinner] by 10% of the target's max HP (100 per turn; for Focused Encounters, if the Part is broken)
Gain 1 [AttackDmgUp] next turn for every 15% missing HP at Turn End (max 3)
If an ally is about to be defeated from [Laceration] damage, prevent them from being defeated from [Laceration] damage for the turn (once per Encounter for each Identity)

notes.short: Consumes {status:BloodDinner} to gain {status:BloodArmorPersonalityFirst}. At 15+ {status:BloodArmorPersonalityFirst}, consumes {status:BloodArmorPersonalityFirst} to use stronger versions of her skills depending on whether the other La Manchaland identities were deployed (each identity, including herself, corresponds to a different skill). Gives herself {status:Laceration} to generate more {status:BloodDinner} and heals based on damage dealt.
notes.full:
All her skills have a base and an enhanced version. The enhanced versions are triggered when she has 15+ {status:BloodArmorPersonalityFirst} and the corresponding La Manchaland identity was deployed:
{identity:11210} for S1
{identity:11111} for S2
Herself for S3
{identity:10911} for defense

{status:BloodArmorPersonalityFirst} is a stacking that comes in 3 stages corresponding to having 1-9, 10-19, and 20-30 stacks. Stage 1 gives speed, stage 2 offense level, and stage 3 defense level, each based on the stage of the status and also giving the buffs from the previous stages. {status:BloodArmorPersonalityFirst} is generated on each of her base skills or when allies take {status:Laceration} damage or consume {status:BloodDinner}, and is consumed by each of her enhanced attack skills in multiples of 10 (S1-2 can consume 10, S2-2 can consume 10 or 20, S3-3 can consume 10, 20, or 30) or her defense which consumes half. If there isn't enough {status:BloodDinner} for her to generate {status:BloodArmorPersonalityFirst} with her base skills, she applies {status:Laceration} on herself instead. Additionally, Her S1-2 gives her {status:Laceration} regardless.

Other special effects on her skills include:
Healing based on damage dealt for all skills
Increased atk weight based on {status:BloodArmorPersonalityFirst} on both versions of her S2
Bonus {status:BloodDinner} produced whenever either versions of her S3 kills
Her S3-2 recovering half of the {status:BloodArmorPersonalityFirst} spend if it kills and spreading {status:Laceration} to all enemies if the last coin kills.
Both versions of her defense skill providing {status:SwirlingBloodPersonality} to allies which is a shield that generates {status:BloodDinner} when consumed by {status:Laceration} damage.

Her passive generates bonus {status:BloodDinner} whenever she kills an enemy based on the max HP of the enemy, gives her {status:AttackDmgUp} based on missing HP, and prevents allies from dying from {status:Laceration} damage for 1 turn once per encounter. She also gets increased {status:BloodArmorPersonalityFirst} generation for every La Manchaland identity that dies, and if 3 of them die, she gains {status:SadLamanchaland} every turn increasing damage dealt and received and giving her Clash Power.
